segments.text: Look , there are some words on the fish .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know that they are auspicious fish . It's quite popular nowadays .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For God's sake ! It's too bloody . How can people be so cruel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . I think the tattoos are so cool and chic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can't prick the fish to please the sick tastes of some bloody people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , it's not so serious . It's just an animal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just an animal ? But it has life too . If you want a tattoo , get one . It's your choice because you want it . But has anyone asked the fish if it wanted one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I understand , but what else could we do ?
segments.speaker: S2
